definitions.title: 2 d
definitions.body: infr.); pl. abs. [[מֵאוֹת]] Ge 5:9 + 324 t. ([[מֵאׂת]] only Ge 5:4, Ge 5:30); [[המאיות]] Kt 2Ki 11:4 + 3 t. 2Ki 11; du. [[מָאתַיִם]] ([[־תָָיִם]]) Ge 11:19 + 76 t. (but 1Sa 18:27 rd. [[מֵאָה]] ([[מְאַת]]) LXX We Dr Kit Bu HPS);—hundred:—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: abs. sg., (I) foll. by sg. of noun enumerated: [[מֵאָה קְשִׂיטָה]] Ge 33:19, Jos 24:32 (both E); [[אִישׁ]] ´[[מ]] Ju Jdg 7:19, 1Ki 18:13, 2Ki 4:43; [[אַמָּה]] ´[[מ]] 1Ki 7:2, Ez Eze 40:19 +; [[כִּכָּר]] ´[[מ]] 2Ki 23:33, 2Ch 25:6, 2Ch 27:5, 2Ch 36:3, Ezr 8:26; [[אֶלֶף]] ´[[מ]] = 100,000 1Ki 20:29 + 6 t. K Ch; cf. also Ge 17:17 (P), 2Sa 8:4, Is 65:20, Is 65:20, and sq. n. coll. [[רֶכֶב]] 2Sa 8:4 = 1Ch 18:4, [[חאׁן]] 1Ki 5:3; (2) less oft. sq. pl. [[מֵאָה שְׁעָרִים]] Ge 26:12 (J), [[פְּעָמִים]] ´[[מ]] 2Sa 24:3 = 1Ch 21:3, [[נְבִיאִים]] ´[[מ]] 1Ki 18:4, etc.; (3) seldom, and late, preceded by n.pl.: [[הָרִמּׂנִים מֵאָה]] Je 52:23, [[אַמּוֹת הַמֵּאָה]] Ez Eze 42:2, cf. Ezr 2:69, 2Ch 3:16, 2Ch 4:8, 2Ch 29:32; (4) exceptional is [[מֵאָה לְכִּכָּרִים כְּלֵי כֶסֶף]] Ezr 8:26; also, with ellipsis, [[מֵאָה כֶסֶף]] De 22:19 (i.e. shekels); [[מֵאָה קַיִץ]] 2Sa 16:1 (i.e. cakes); (5) [[מֵאָה]] without noun enumerated, esp. = a hundred (men, persons) Ju Jdg 20:10, Jdg 20:10, Am 5:3, Am 5:3, Le 26:8, Le 26:8 (H), 1Ch 12:l4; ´[[מ]] Pr 17:10 = 100 (blows), Ec 6:3 = 100 (children), Ec 8:12 = 100 (times).—On Ne 3:1, Ne 12:39 v. infr.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: abs. pl. [[ת]]([[וֹ]])[[מֵא]]:—(1) alone, = hundreds, [[לְמֵאוֹת]] 1Sa 29:2 by hundreds, so 2Sa 18:4 (both + thousands); esp. ´[[מּ]]([[הַ]])[[שָׂרֵי ]] captains of (the) hundreds  Ex 18:21, Ex 18:25 (E), 2Ki 11:4, 2Ki 11:9, 2Ki 11:10, 2Ki 11:15 +; (2) multiplied, sq. noun enumerated, in sg.: [[אִישׁ]] ´[[שְׁלשׁ מ]] Ju Jdg 7:6 300 men, cf. v:Jdg 7:7, v:Jdg 7:8, v:Jdg 7:16, Jdg 8:4, Ex 12:27 (E), etc.; [[שָׁנׇה]] ´[[אַרְבַּע מ]] Ge 15:13 (JE) 400 years; [[אֶלֶף]] ´[[חֲמֵשׁ מ]] 2Sa 24:9 500,000, cf. 2Ch 13:17; [[רֶכֶב]] ´[[שֵׁשׁ מ]] Ex 14:7 (J) 600 chariots; [[אִישׁ שְׁבַע]] ´[[מ]] Ju Jdg 20:15, Jdg 20:16 700 men; [[חָלָל]] ´[[שְׁמׂנֶה מ]] 2Sa 23:8 800 slain; [[רֶכֶב]] ´[[תְּשַׁע מ]] Ju Jdg 4:3, Jdg 4:13 900 chariots; (3) less oft. sq. n.pl.: [[שׁוּעָלִים]] ´[[שְׁלשׁ מ]] Ju Jdg 15:4 300 foxes; [[אֲתוֹנוֹת]] ´[[חֲמֵשׁ מ]] Job 1:3 500 she-asses, etc.; (4) rare, and chiefly late, after n.pl. ´[[פִּלַגְשִׁים שְׁלשׁ מ]] 1Ki 11:3 300 concubines, cf. 1Ki 7:42 = 2Ch 4:13, 1Ch 4:42, 2Ch 14:8 etc.; after n.coll. ´[[בָּקָר חֲמֵשׁ מ]] 2Ch 35:9; (5) rare is [[בַּשֶּׁקֶל]] ´[[חֲמֵשׁ מ]] Ex 30:24 (P); (6) ellipsis of n., [[כֶּסֶף]] ´[[שְׁלשׁ מ]] Ge 45:22 (E), etc.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: cstr. sg., only sq. sg., and late: [[מְאַת־שָׁנׇה]] Ge 11:10, Ge 21:5, Ge 25:7 (all P) + 25 t. P, 1Ch 25:9, Es 1:4 (Dr:Intr. 124) (also c. other numerals, v.
infr.); [[מְâַאת]] Ec 8:12 = 100 times ([[מֵאָה פְּעָמִים]]), sc. [[פַּעַם]], or perhaps only appar. cstr. (Kö:ii. 228 cf. Ew:§ 269 b. 279 e).—Ne 5:11 v.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: usually preceding tens and units, (1) with noun expressed once, or not at all, earlier usage, usu. c. [[וְ]] before ten if no unit follows, otherwise without [[וְ]] before ten (see Kö:ii. 218 ff.): [[מֵאָה וְעֶשֶׂר שָׂרִים]] Ju Jdg 2:8; [[שִׁשִּׁים וׇשֵׁשׁ כִּכָּר שֵׁשׁ מֵאוֹת]] 1Ki 10:14 666 talents, etc. (exceptions are Ne 7:24 and v:Ne 7:31); (2) chiefly late, with noun and [[וְ]] repeated: [[שָׁנׇה]] [[וְעֶשְׂרִים]] [[שָׁנׇה]] [[מֵאָה]] [[שָׁנִים]] [[וְשֶׁבַע]] Ge 23:1 (P) (cf. [[ואלף אמה ומאת אמה]] SI:5.6 Da:Expos. Times. May, 1898).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: less oft., foll. tens and units, chiefly late, c. [[וְ]] repeated:—[[עֶשְׂרִים וּמֵאָה]] Nu 7:86 (P); [[שֶׁבַע וּשְׁלשִׁים וּמְאַת שָׁנׇה]] Ex 6:16 (P), etc.; c. noun after ten and after hundred, [[חָמֵשׁ וְשִׁשִּׁים שָׁנׇה וּשְׁלשׁ מֵאוֹת שָׁנׇה]] Ge 5:23 (P), etc.— On these usages v., further, Kö:ii. 217 ff. Da:Synt. §§ 36 R. 3, 37 (d) Ges: §§ 97, 134 and esp. Herner:Synt. d. Zahlwörter im AT (1893). †
[[מְאַת הַכֶּסֶף]] Ne 5:11 = a hundredth part of the money; but read quite poss. [[מַשַּׁאת]] the debt (Gei:Jüd. Zeitschr. viii. 1870, 227 Gr.)
